scripts.build:android: yarn mkdist && yarn legal-generate && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res
scripts.build:ios: yarn mkdist && yarn legal-generate && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.e2e:android: yarn mke2e_results && maestro test --config=e2e/config.yaml --exclude-tags=ios --format junit --output=e2e_results/report.xml e2e
scripts.e2e:ios: yarn mke2e_results && maestro test --config=e2e/config.yaml --exclude-tags=android --format junit --output=e2e_results/report.xml e2e
scripts.pod:install: RCT_USE_PREBUILT_RNCORE=1 RCT_USE_RN_DEP=1 bundle exec pod install --project-directory=ios --repo-update
